hero.title: Embark on a Medieval Adventure
hero.subtitle: Step into Les Terres du Lion, a medieval festival where every visitor becomes a hero and every step drives the adventure forward.

features.title: Explore the Medieval Era
features.subtitle: Immerse yourself in history with our comprehensive features

paragraphs.1: Welcome to Les Terres du Lion, a unique medieval event inspired by live-action role-playing. Designed for total immersion, the festival plunges you into a world of quests, legendary creatures, and ancient craftsmanship.
paragraphs.2: Centered around a vast thematic village, each zone invites you to meet passionate artisans, performers, restaurateurs, and creators who bring an authentic medieval universe to life.
paragraphs.3: Through an enriched interactive experience — quests accessible via QR codes, workshop reservations, click & collect, quizzes, and creation galleries — every visitor becomes the main character of their own journey.
paragraphs.4: The dedicated app allows you to explore, learn, discover, and progress throughout the adventure ending at the castle, where the story reaches its climax.
paragraphs.5: Les Terres du Lion is a place where immersion meets technology, where heritage inspires play, and where every visit writes a new legend.
